name: NuoNuo
description:
Featured by Apple in "New and Noteworthy".
Game video: http://tinyurl.com/nuovideo

Caution! This game is VERY exciting, challenging, and addicting. And of course… AMAZING FUN!

WEBSITE:
==================================
http://www.facebook.com/pages/NuoNuo/205373784141
http://twitter.com/nuo_nuo
Leader Board History:http://www.cocoslive.net/game-scores?gamename=NuoNuo

WHAT IS NUONUO?
==================================
A strange and unknown monster called “The Dark” has fallen from the sky and is trying to stop all plants from growing!

Now Nuonuo… the spirit of Water must guarantee safety of the plants and stop “The Dark’s” evil plan.

Nuonuo is a challenging and exciting game that is easy to pick up.

The higher you go, the more challenging the game becomes. The more you play, the more your palms will start to sweat! So make sure you’ve got a firm grip on your Iphone ;)

HOW TO PLAY?
==================================
Draw clouds on the screen to keep Nuonuo from falling.

The lower on the screen you create the cloud. The higher Nuonuo will jump.

Change Nuonuo’s direction by drawing the cloud in different directions.

Make sure Nuonuo avoids the dark clouds.

They’ll slow him down and push him back.
Bouncing off the bottom of a cloud will bounce Nuonuo right back, and you’ll have to respond quickly to draw another cloud.

The higher Nuonuo climbs, the higher his score becomes.

On Nuonuo’s way up, he can collect nuts to gain points, or magic mushrooms as powerups. These powerups allow Nuonuo to travel through all obstacles.

GAME FEATURES
==================================
Nuonuo will randomly change shapes through a new animation technology. These shapes influence the way he interacts with his environment!

Each element in the game is generated randomly. This way the player has a new experience every time he plays.
An innovative design for bosses and items makes Nuonuo’s floating experience harder as the game progresses.

Players can decide for themselves if they want to post their high scores to the leader boards!
